page.title: 01The countryside of our area
page.content: Our Domesday project area lies to the north and east of Landford village,in the extreme south of the county of Wiltshire.It is mostly fields and woodland.There are hardly any factories and it is very peaceful. There are a few sawmills and a few planted evergreens.Sometimes if you walk down a road you will have planted evergreens on one side and deciduous mixed trees on the other side.It is rolling countryside,mainly used for dairy farming and the growing of grass for silage and hay.There are several poultry farms supplying chickens for sale in shops and supermarkets.{ There are no shops or post offices in the block, just groups of houses lining the lanes at Landford Wood and Plaitford and otherwise scattered cottages and farmhouses.Some timber- framed houses are over 400 years old.
